info.name: Upside Down Websites (-CyberationMicro-)
info.description:
WARNING READ DESCRIPTION FIRST! This makes all sites upside down. Please note this is just for fun. I am sure it will drive you nuts later! Read description how to remove.
-------------------------------------- SUPPORT MY THEMES BY DONATING DONATE NOW --------------------------------------
info.additionalInfo:
Google Chrome: Click stylish at the top and remove or disable Upside Down (-CyberationMicro-) 

Firefox. Click the firefox logo and go to Add-ons / userstyles tab / Upside Down (-CyberationMicro-) and remove or disable
